peripheralPage.name: MCG

clockSelectionOption.toolTip: Selects the clock configuration used for general peripheral timing calculations

binaryOption.toolTip: If disabled this clock setting will be removed from the generated code

choiceOption.toolTip: Determines oscillator power mode and\n whether an external clock or crystal is used.
Determines whether an external clock or crystal is used

categoryOption.toolTip: Clock configurations for different run modes

graphic.toolTip: Opens a dialogue to alter this clock configuration

category.name: LIRC
category.description: Low Speed Internal Reference Clock Sources [LIRC]

intOption.enabledBy: (/MCG/mcgClockMode[%(n)]==LIRC_2MHz)||((!/MCG/mcg_c2_ircs[%(n)])&&(/MCG/mcg_c1_irclken[%(n)])), Disabled as IRC not in use by MCG
intOption.description: Frequency of Slow Internal Reference [SIRC] Clock
intOption.toolTip: Dependent on device and clock Trim. [Nominally 2MHz]

intOption.enabledBy: (/MCG/mcgClockMode[%(n)]==LIRC_8MHz)||((/MCG/mcg_c2_ircs[%(n)])&&(/MCG/mcg_c1_irclken[%(n)])), Disabled as IRC not in use by MCG
intOption.description: Frequency of Fast Internal Reference [FIRC] Clock
intOption.toolTip: Dependent on device and clock Trim. [Nominally 8MHz]

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the HIRC even when MCG_Lite is not working at HIRC mode

choice.name: Enabled as required by MCG mode

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the HIRC even when MCG_Lite is not working at HIRC mode

choice.name: Enabled as required by MCG mode

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the HIRC in Low-power modes such as Stop/VLPR/VLPW/VLPS mode

intOption.description: Frequency of Low Speed Internal Reference [LIRC_CLK]

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the LIRC, even when MCG not using LIRC

choice.name: Disabled when not used by MCG

binaryOption.toolTip: Enables the LIRC in Stop mode (also requires IRCLKEN=1)

choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the amount to divide down the selected internal reference clock\n The FIR clock is available for use as MCGOUTCLK and after further division as MCGIRCLK

intOption.description: Frequency of Low Speed Internal Reference [LIRC_DIV1_CLK]

choiceOption.description: Second Low-frequency Internal Reference Clock Divider
choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the factor value to further divide the LIRC source

intOption.toolTip: Derived from Slow IRC or Fast IRC/lirc_div1/lirc_div2
External reference clock used by MCG

choiceOption.toolTip: Selects the clock source for MCGOUTCLK\n This option is determined by the Clock Mode selection\n

Clock Modes
 LIRC_8MHz - 8 MHz low power internal reference clock
 LIRC_2MHz - 2 MHz low power internal reference clock
 HIRC_48MHz - 48 MHz high speed internal reference clock
 EXT - External reference clock (OSCCLK)
Selects the frequency range for the crystal oscillator if used.\n It may determine the divider for FLL input clock

intOption.toolTip: Output of HIRC_48MHz available as peripheral clock

stringOption.toolTip: Source of MCG Output Clock\n Determined by current clock mode

intOption.toolTip: MCG Main clock output\n Derived from HIRC_48MHz, LIRC-8M/2M, EXT

for.initialValueTemplate: \t /// SIM CLKDIV1 System Clock Divider Register 1 %initExpression\n\n
\t /// SIM CLKDIV3 System Clock Divider Register 3 %initExpression\n\n
